title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.4 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.4 - Applications

State Regulations
(a) Applications
for assignment of a special number plate must be made upon a form prescribed by
the commissioner. All such applications shall be date-stamped upon receipt. In
the event the issuance of a particular special plate is requested by more than
one applicant, the plate shall be issued to the person whose application was
first received, except as provided in subdivision (b) of this
section. (b) In reserved series, the commissioner may establish a different method of issuance than that in
subdivision (a) of this section, based upon seniority, accreditation or other
criteria or qualifications established for the appropriate group. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
16.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
